== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Zesty Zapus (17.04) for Beta 1 on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/ZestyZapus/ReleaseSchedule | 19 February, 2017]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 1''' pre-release, you can see what we are trying out in preparation for our next version.

The Kubuntu team will be releasing 17.04 in April.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 1 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

== KDE Applications 16.12.1 ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:kwave.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| Kubuntu comes with <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/announce-applications-16.12.1.php |KDE Applications 16.12.1]]</nowiki> containing all your favourite apps from KDE, with the exception of okular and PIM and related products. This is the 16.12.1 update with bugfixes and translation updates. Most applications have been ported to <nowiki>[[https://dot.kde.org/2013/09/25/frameworks-5|KDE Frameworks 5]]</nowiki> but those which aren't should fit in seamlessly.<<BR>><<BR>>Non-KDE applications include <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/5.2|LibreOffice 5.2]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/50.1.0/releasenotes/|Firefox 50.1]]</nowiki>.
|}

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 17.04, Zesty Zapus, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs and laptops]]</nowiki>.

You can give us feedback on <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|Google +]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Gplus.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|Facebook]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-FB.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|Twitter]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Twitter.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]].
